title: Wheat Peanut Health mix powder Recipe for Babies - Peanut Porridge Powder
content:
Healthy nutritious peanut wheat powder which is very good for weight gaining in babies. You can start giving this powder after 8 months.

Peanuts have so many health benefits in them.

 

1)Good for physical development

2)Ideal for brain development.

3)It has lots of vitamins and minerals.

4)Good source of antioxidants.

 

You can start this powder for babies above 8 months. 

 

Wheat Peanut Health Mix for Babies

 

Preparation time

10 mins

 

Cook time

15 mins

 

Total time

25 mins

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 2 cups

 

Ingredients

FOR WHEAT POWDER:

Wheat Rava - 1 cup

Green Gram - ½ cup

Peanuts - ¼ cup

 

FOR MAKING PORRIDGE:

Wheat Powder - 3 tablespoon

Water - 1 cup

Salt to taste

Ghee to taste

 

Instructions

Take wheat rava in a dry pan and roast till golden. Remove to a plate.

Take green gram in a dry pan and roast till golden. Remove to a plate.

Cool it down.

Powder it finely. Remove to a bowl.

Now take peanuts in a pan, roast till golden.

Take peanuts in a blender and powder lightly. Don't over grind else it will get pasty,

Add this to the broken wheat and mix well.

Store in an airtight container in the fridge.

For making porridge, take powder and water in a saucepan and cook till it thickens and cooked.

Add salt and ghee and mix well.

Serve.
